hero.title: Game da Cibiyar Musulunci
hero.subtitle: Gano tarihinmu, manufa, da mutane masu sadaukarwa da ke haɓaka al’ummarmu.

mission.title: Manufarmu
mission.statement: Gina al’umma Musulmi mai ƙarfafa imani, ilimi, da gudummawa. Muna neman zama wani haske na darajojin Musulunci, muna ba da jagorar ruhaniya, kayan karatu da tallafi ga Musulmai a Babura da kewaye.

vision.title: hangen nesanmu
vision.statement: Kirkiro tsarin Musulunci mai dorewa inda kowanne Musulmi zai bunkasa ruhaniya, ilimi da zamantakewa. Muna ganin cibiyar mu a matsayin shiriya na cigaba da inganci a Najeriya.

timelines.title: 1995: Farawa
timelines.text: Cibiyar Abu bkar Nakore an kafa ta a matsayin wurin haduwar al’umma kananan ta hannun marigayi Abu bkar Nakore da iyalinsa.

timelines.title: 2002: Ginin Masallaci
timelines.text: Da taimakon al’umma, an kammala ginin babban masallaci wanda zai iya karbar masu sallah 500.

timelines.title: 2008: Makarantar Musulunci
timelines.text: An kafa makarantar Musulunci tana koyar da Qur’ani da ilimin zamani ga sama da ɗalibai 200.

timelines.title: 2015: Kafa Waqf
timelines.text: Cibiyar an dage ta a matsayin waqf na dindindin domin tabbatar da dorewarta ga al’umma.

timelines.title: 2023: Faɗaɗa ayyuka
timelines.text: Mun kammala fadada cibiyar tare da ƙara sabbin wurare don shirye‑shirye na matasa da tarurruka.

governance.title: Tsarin Gudanarwa
governance.subtitle: Tsarinmu na ƙungiya yana tabbatar da shugabanci mai gaskiya da inganci bisa ƙa’idodin addini.

trustee.title: Majalisar Amintattu
trustee.subtitle: Dabaru da Kulawa
trustee.brief: Majalisar ta ƙunshi akalla mutane biyar masu aminci, ɗaya daga cikin ’ya’ya marigayin Abu bkar Nakore.

responsibilities.title: Ayyuka:
items: Amincewa da rahotannin bincike kowane kwata
Sauya membobin da suka rasu ko suka ajiye mukamansu

trustee.quote: Ana zaɓen mambobi ne bisa nagartar su da sadaukarwa ga darajojin Musulunci.

management.title: Majalisar Gudanarwa
management.subtitle: Gudanar da ayyukan yau da kullum
management.brief: Majalisar tana da mambobi fiye da goma sha ɗaya masu kula da ayyukan yau da kullum tare da kula da Majalisar Amintattu.

composition.title: Tsarin mambobi:
items: Wakilan Iyali na Abu bkar Nakore

management.quote: Majalisar Gudanarwa tana aiwatar da ƙa’idojin da Majalisar Amintattu ta kafa.

governance.relationshipNote: Majalisar Gudanarwa tana da alhakin Majalisar Amintattu • Babu wanda zai yi aiki a majalisu biyu a lokaci guda

leadership.title: Jagorancinmu
leadership.subtitle: Mutane masu sadaukarwa suna jagorantar al’ummarmu da hikima da gaskiya.

impact.title: Tasirinmu a Al’umma
impact.subtitle: Muna sauya rayuwa ta hanyar imani, ilimi da hidima.

items.title: Yawan ɗalibai
items.desc: Yara masu karɓar ilimin addini da na zamani kowace shekara

items.title: Adadin Salla da aka gudanar
items.desc: Sallolin yau da kullum da Juma’a a kowace shekara

items.title: Iyalan da aka tallafa
items.desc: Ta hanyar shirye‑shirye na zakka da taimako
